ComicInfo.Summary:
The BEK Boy King plots his revenge. Jim sets into play his desperate plan to save his possessed son. Gus and Meredith come face-to-face with a familiar face from the past. The Black-Eyed Children go on the hunt.
From EISNER AWARD winner (and 6-time nominee) Joe Pruett and the artist of DAREDEVIL/PUNISHER and SPAWN.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 1 | RE | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | Missing |
